name: Sunny Shapes
description:
Prepare for the NEWEST & SUNNIEST game ever!

Surf’s up with Sunny Shapes, the new Match 3 that’s sure to test your matching skills! Create Mega Matches for awesome Power-Ups to help you solve the puzzles even faster!

Don’t be a party pooper and join the Sunny Shapes fun!

===Features===

PUZZLES MODE
Test your mind and match to win trophies in Puzzles Mode! Come back daily for NEW challenging brain teasers to expand your trophy collection.

MARATHON MODE
Play against the clock in Marathon Mode! Earn as many points as possible before the timer runs out and stay cool in this time-themed brain teaser!

MATCH BY COLOR OR SHAPES
Match your way to higher levels by connecting stars, hearts, triangles and more! Match horizontally, vertically, or diagonally to clear the board!

SPECIAL POWER-UPS
Make massive matching combos to blow shapes off the board! The bigger the match the better the power-up!

Get the party started and join in on the match 3 fun! Download Sunny Shapes today!

Tell your friends about Sunny Shapes and throw your own party!
